cells.text: COMMUNITY OUTREACH
cells.text_vi: Cộng đồng tiếp cận

cells.text: Southern Peru is a major economic engine in Peru’s
cells.text_vi: Nam Peru là một động cơ kinh tế lớn ở Peru

cells.text: southern area and is particularly involved in the sustain-
cells.text_vi: khu vực phía nam và đặc biệt tham gia vào

cells.text: able development and wellbeing of the people of Tacna

cells.text: with various public agencies and the people themselves.

cells.text_vi: velopment. Nam Peru là một công ty tốt, xã hội và

cells.text: In 2004, SPCC carried out the following main projects:

cells.text: frastructure improvements were made in four valley areas.
